verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Command<WH6680> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them, When ye come<WH935> into the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>; (this is the land<WH776> that shall fall<WH5307> unto you for an inheritance<WH5159>, even the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667> with the coasts<WH1367> thereof:)

Then your south<WH5045> quarter<WH6285> shall be from the wilderness<WH4057> of Zin<WH6790> along by the coast<WH3027> of Edom<WH123>, and your south<WH5045> border<WH1366> shall be the outmost coast<WH7097> of the salt<WH4417> sea<WH3220> eastward<WH6924>:

And your border<WH1366> shall turn<WH5437> from the south<WH5045> to the ascent<WH4608> of Akrabbim<WH4610>, and pass on<WH5674> to Zin<WH6790>: and the going forth<WH8444> thereof shall be from the south<WH5045> to Kadeshbarnea<WH6947>, and shall go on<WH3318> to Hazaraddar<WH2692>, and pass on<WH5674> to Azmon<WH6111>:
And the border<WH1366> shall fetch a compass<WH5437> from Azmon<WH6111> unto the river<WH5158> of Egypt<WH4714>, and the goings out<WH8444> of it shall be at the sea<WH3220>.
And as for the western<WH3220> border<WH1366>, ye shall even have the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> for a border<WH1366>: this shall be your west<WH3220> border<WH1366>.
And this shall be your north<WH6828> border<WH1366>: from the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> ye shall point out<WH8376> for you mount<WH2022> Hor<WH2023>:
From mount<WH2022> Hor<WH2023> ye shall point out<WH8376> your border unto the entrance<WH935> of Hamath<WH2574>; and the goings forth<WH8444> of the border<WH1366> shall be to Zedad<WH6657>:
And the border<WH1366> shall go on<WH3318> to Ziphron<WH2202>, and the goings out<WH8444> of it shall be at Hazarenan<WH2704>: this shall be your north<WH6828> border<WH1366>.
And ye shall point out<WH184> your east<WH6924> border<WH1366> from Hazarenan<WH2704> to Shepham<WH8221>:

And the coast<WH1366> shall go down<WH3381> from Shepham<WH8221> to Riblah<WH7247>, on the east side<WH6924> of Ain<WH5871>; and the border<WH1366> shall descend<WH3381>, and shall reach<WH4229> unto the side<WH3802> of the sea<WH3220> of Chinnereth<WH3672> eastward<WH6924>: side of the sea: Heb. shoulder of the sea

And the border<WH1366> shall go down<WH3381> to Jordan<WH3383>, and the goings out<WH8444> of it shall be at the salt<WH4417> sea<WH3220>: this shall be your land<WH776> with the coasts<WH1367> thereof round about<WH5439>.

And Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, This is the land<WH776> which ye shall inherit<WH5157> by lot<WH1486>, which the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> to give<WH5414> unto the nine<WH8672> tribes<WH4294>, and to the half<WH2677> tribe<WH4294>:

For the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7206> according to the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1>, and the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1425> according to the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1>, have received<WH3947> their inheritance; and half<WH2677> the tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh<WH4519> have received<WH3947> their inheritance<WH5159>:

The two<WH8147> tribes<WH4294> and the half<WH2677> tribe<WH4294> have received<WH3947> their inheritance<WH5159> on this side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> near Jericho<WH3405> eastward<WH6924>, toward the sunrising<WH4217>.
And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,
These are the names<WH8034> of the men<WH582> which shall divide<WH5157> the land<WH776> unto you: Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548>, and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126>.
And ye shall take<WH3947> one<WH259> prince<WH5387> of every tribe<WH4294>, to divide<WH5157> the land<WH776> by inheritance<WH5157>.
And the names<WH8034> of the men<WH582> are these: Of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah<WH3063>, Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312>.
And of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon<WH8095>, Shemuel<WH8050> the son<WH1121> of Ammihud<WH5989>.
Of the tribe<WH4294> of Benjamin<WH1144>, Elidad<WH449> the son<WH1121> of Chislon<WH3692>.
And the prince<WH5387> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835>, Bukki<WH1231> the son<WH1121> of Jogli<WH3020>.
The prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130>, for the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519>, Hanniel<WH2592> the son<WH1121> of Ephod<WH641>.
And the prince<WH5387> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669>, Kemuel<WH7055> the son<WH1121> of Shiphtan<WH8204>.
And the prince<WH5387> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Zebulun<WH2074>, Elizaphan<WH469> the son<WH1121> of Parnach<WH6535>.
And the prince<WH5387> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Issachar<WH3485>, Paltiel<WH6409> the son<WH1121> of Azzan<WH5821>.
And the prince<WH5387> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Asher<WH836>, Ahihud<WH282> the son<WH1121> of Shelomi<WH8015>.
And the prince<WH5387> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Naphtali<WH5321>, Pedahel<WH6300> the son<WH1121> of Ammihud<WH5989>.
These are they whom the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> to divide the inheritance<WH5157> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>.
